snippet: The well-respected Cuddyer struggled last season after the Mets signed him as a free agent on a two-year deal.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Michael Cuddyer decides to retire from New York Mets with one year left in his contract; Cuddyer's move could allow Mets financial room as they continue to build their 2016 team.
lead_paragraph: The well-respected Cuddyer struggled last season after the Mets signed him as a free agent on a two-year deal.

headline.main: Michael Cuddyer Calls It a Career, and the Mets Gain Some Flexibility
headline.print_headline: Michael Cuddyer Calls It a Career, and the Mets Gain Some Flexibility
